Package by.epam.jwd.web.validation

Interface Validation<T extends DbEntity>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - entity type that need to be validated.
    public interface Validation<T extends DbEntity>
    Validation interface that defines entity validation behavior. Validate entity and forms invalid messages list. If invalid message list is empty that means tha entity is valid.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      java.util.List<java.lang.String> validate​(T entity)
      Makes entity validation and forms invalid messages.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> validate​(T entity)
        Makes entity validation and forms invalid messages. If invalid message list is empty thar means that entity is valid. Empty messages list will be returned if validated entity is valid or not empty message list will be returned otherwise.
        Parameters:
        entity - entity that need to be validated.
        Returns:
        list of invalid messages. If entity is valid then empty list will be returned. Not empty list will be returned if validated entity is invalid.
